name: Scunci by Conair The Original Scrunchie Hair Ties, 20 Count Velvet Hair Scrunchies for Women, Super-Comfy Ponytail Holders, Everyday Style Accessories for Sports and Working Out, Assorted Colors
short_description: VELVET SCRUNCHIES: Whether you're looking for a hair tie worthy of a night out or something to brighten up your everyday look, this bag of 20 velvet scrunchies has a color for every outfit & occasion!

GENTLE ON HAIR, STRONG ON STYLE: Our high-quality scrunchies come in a variety of styles & colors from vivid velvets to satin prints, & soft knits. They don't snag or break strands or leave unsightly “bumps.”
NO-DAMAGE HAIR ACCESSORIES: From classic scrunchies & No Damage hair elastics to glam bobby pins, slides, hair wraps & clips, Scunci has the perfect accessories for fitness fanatics & style mavens.
CHOOSE THE ORIGINAL: Scunci unleashed The Original Scrunchie hair tie on the world back in the 80s, and the formerly humble hair accessory has enjoyed unprecedented popularity ever since.
CONAIR HAIR CARE: Since 1959, we have made innovative small appliances, hair styling tools, & more. Our hair care line includes high-quality hair dryers, brushes, styling tools, & hair accessories.
product_description: In a world full of copies, choose the original Scunci by Conair unleashed The Original Scrunchie on the world back in the 80s, and the formerly humble hair accessory has enjoyed unprecedented popularity ever since. Pick from 20 velvet hair scrunchies in all the colors of the rainbow and be fabulous. From short hair to long thick hair, scrunchies are just right for pulling long hair back while sleeping to prevent tangling, throwing thick hair up while lounging around the house or doing chores, and keeping long, thick hair out of the way while washing your face during your morning or evening routine. These Scunci scrunchies for women are also a hair fashion statement for your active style to wear during sports and working out, or just as a complement to your entire look no matter what you’re doing. The Scunci hair ties are made with soft thermal fabric, so they are gentle on hair and don't snag, tear, rip, break, mark your long, thick hair, or create unsightly “bumps.” Mix up your hair fashion by using original scrunchies for a dramatic high ponytail, in a casual bun or topknot, or to create a more sophisticated style by placing it lower, at the nape of your neck. Each scrunchie measures approximately 1" in width and approximately 4" long when unpackaged and unstretched. At Conair, we empower you along your hair journey with the widest range of the latest hair tools and accessories that invite you to discover the joy of change.
